startup_ideas.title: AI-powered restaurant recipe directory covering global restaurants
startup_ideas.target_market: Home cooks wanting to recreate restaurant dishes from around the world
startup_ideas.problem_solved: No centralized place to find recipes from major restaurants globally
startup_ideas.business_model: SEO traffic monetization (ads, affiliate marketing, premium content)
startup_ideas.validation: Creator's personal need validated, competing with established recipe sites
startup_ideas.estimated_investment: Low - mainly tool subscriptions and time
